content.title: Hydrogen 1.0 The new project from BloomFab is coming soon! (With a free STL to claim on the launch)
content.creator:
BloomFab
February 28, 2025
content.content:
Everyone has received their files, and the commercial licenses have been delivered!
All late pledgers and backers who had payment issues have now received their files.
Additionally, as requested, the commercial licenses (including Master Licenses) have been updated and sent directly to the backers. If you're concerned that you missed it, feel free to check your private messages on Kickstarter, the link is waiting for you there!
The new project of BloomFab, HydroGen 1.0 is coming!
More details about the HydroGen 1.0 HERE!
Behind this intriguing name hides a complete starter kit for hydroponic enthusiasts!
Grow your own salads (or any other plants suited to the Kratky method) without the need for electricity!
There are plenty of YouTube tutorials on starting a hydroponic farm, but most require tools and a fair amount of skill. While they certainly work, the results often lack aesthetic appeal.
HydroGen 1.0 bridges the gap by combining the precision of 3D printing (for both function and aesthetics) with the simplest hydroponic method, perfect for beginners!
We're launching on Tuesday, so feel free to follow the launch! Even if hydroponics isn't your thing, we're giving away a free STL for your garden for the first time! ðŸŒ±
Here is the link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/bloomfab/hydrogen-3d-your-3d-printed-mini-hydroponic-farm 
BloomFab

content.title: Project funded and extra stretch goal unlocked!!
content.creator:
BloomFab
February 7, 2025
content.content:
What an incredible journey!
We succeeded to unlock every single stretch goal of this project and even some for the previous one!! 
Taking inspiration from the Hydropote 2.0 to the 1.0, we also made some adjustements on the inside part to make it fully support free. We also added another style for the first hydropot!
Here is a preview of the extra stretch goal from the first project we just unlocked together:
About delivery
If you came from the first project, you know how fast we deliver. You'll will receive all of the STLs, directly in your Kickstarter inbox in a day or two.

Note: Some people have some trouble with their payment. If it's your case try to fix it as soon as possible, you'll not receive your pledges before the problem is solved on your side ;)
Thank you so much for your support on that new project!!
BloomFab

comments.text: Hi, apologies if this is a stupid question - who will receive this stretch goal? I looked for it in the DropBox link you sent and could not find it... and it looks nice :)
It's in the dropbox of the Hydropote 1.0. If you pledge for it as an addon or if you got it from our previous project, you can check for it.

content.title: Which print bed do you need to print the Hydropote 2.0 ?
content.creator:
BloomFab
January 12, 2025
content.content:
Almost reach the first stretch goal in less than a week!
This new version of the Hydropote seems to be very popular! In less than a week we almost reach the first stretch goal!!
About the size of your printer
After receiving some questions about it, I realize that I forgot to mention the size of the pot and the bed need to print it.
Don't worry a single time, all of the Bloomfab designs are made to be printed on any kind of printers (except the minis) so if you at least have a 23x23cm bed on your printer (most of the printers usually use at least 25x25cm one), you're good to go! 

And even if you have a smaller bed than usual, you can easily reduce the size from 20% without any risk!
